course_description: Students have an opportunity to integrate knowledge derived from their academic studies with experiences gained from real-world work settings. A pre-internship workshop and post-internship reflection assignment help students think critically about the connections between their major and career goals.
sections: Class Nbr: 6069, Section #: 1, Type: IND, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: E. Goode, Status: Open
